document.full_text: the fourth "pirates of the caribbean" movie ruled the foreign box office for a second weekend, fending off strong debuts by the "hangover" and "kung fu panda" sequels.
document.title: "pirates 4" still top pick at foreign box office
lines_and_colors: the fourth "pirates of the caribbean" movie ruled the foreign box office for a second weekend, fending off strong debuts by the "hangover" and "kung fu panda" sequels.
